children.description: The element that triggered the Popover
children.description_zh: The element that triggered the Popover

defaultVisible.description: Whether to show or hide by default
defaultVisible.description_zh: Whether to show or hide by default

destroyOnHide.description: When hiding, whether to destroy the content of tooltip
destroyOnHide.description_zh: When hiding, whether to destroy the content of tooltip

getContainer.description: The floating layer renders the parent node, which would be rendered on the body by default
getContainer.description_zh: The floating layer renders the parent node, which would be rendered on the body by default

mode.description: Set bright color mode or black mode
mode.description_zh: Set bright color mode or black mode

placement.type: top / top-start / top-end / right / right-start / right-end / bottom / bottom-start / bottom-end / left / left-start / left-end

stopPropagation.description: Stop the propagation of some events.
stopPropagation.description_zh: Stop the propagation of some events.

visible.description: Whether to display pop-up content in controlled mode
visible.description_zh: Whether to display pop-up content in controlled mode

events.name: onVisibleChange
events.description: Callback when the visible prop is changed
events.description_zh: Callback when the visible prop is changed
